dc_title_s: Map of the Grand Trunk Road from the Karamnassa to the Sutledge : Part Second from Agra to Ferozepoor compiled by order of the lieutenant governor of the north western provinces in the Office of the Superintendent of the Grand Trunk Road
dc_description_s: Compiled in the office of the surveyer general of India, January, 1860.|228 x 109 centimeters|Scale 1:253,440; 4 British miles = 1 inch|General Map Collection
